subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: A day after beating Caroline Wozniacki in the U.S. Open women’s final, Serena Williams called her first Grand Slam victory of the year “a great satisfaction.”
snippet: A day after beating Caroline Wozniacki in the U.S. Open women’s final, Serena Williams called her first Grand Slam victory of the year “a great satisfaction.”
